name: The Tomb of the Ice Queen
description: "Everything stops. That's the residue of her power. Not just the motion of the elements present by her grave. Everything that ruins us inside will freeze, even if momentary—every worry, every failure, every force of darkness that follows. They have to surrender to her Cold. Those monsters in your nightmares are no match for her ice. And you will be under her care. Frost upon the snowflowers and the icy tides that guide. You will not yearn for the warmth of that fire for a while. Beyond all else, there is beauty in those frozen hills and healing waters of immeasurable cold. Your soul will awaken in the shivers of the ever-winter garden. Blue stains from the sweet arctic wines, all of me rejuvenates, while the chill in place unveils what's wrong with me, like reassembling myself in a subzero therapy. My dearest queen of ice, you are the climate that I want everyday. Travelers undress you, but they cannot handle the real you, your avalanches and ice storms. They give up in one terrifying moment of your true self. But now I understand. In your cold elegance, everything stops. You are a queen. You are bad. You are intense. This is a place of healing that you made, not a grave."
